remarks.para: Either left or right switch may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Slat loss sensing system is deactivated,
Minimum approach speeds are increased by 10 kts for each approach, and
Repair is made within one flight day.
Add 10 knots to the planned Vref for the planned landing flap setting.
Reduce Runway Landing Limit Weight by 25,000 lbs.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.
Add 10 knots to the planned Vref for the planned landing flap setting.
Reduce Runway Landing Limit Weight by 25,000 lbs.
Land and Hold Short Operations (LAHSO) prohibited.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "L (R) INBD SLAT SW INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Deactivate inoperative Inboard Slat Loss switch (Ref. WDM 27-81-31).
Troubleshoot which Inboard Slat Loss switch is inoperative.
Cut and stow wire to inoperative switch as close to switch as possible.
Check for normal operation of slats.
